    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Animal
    Represents an Animal in the Game.
    Dice
    Dice mimics a real world die and is used to generate random numbers in a range.
    Game
    The Game Class serves as the main controller for the Animal Tracking Game.
    GameError
    Defines run-time errors that can be thrown during the execution of the game.
    NatureFeature
    This defines the nature features that players can encounter on the trail.
    Player
    Defines a player in the game.
    Trail
    Trail is an array of nature features.
